tool_description: Data-driven and transparent historical ESG scores for 20,000 companies
name: GaiaLens Historical ESG Scores
title: GaiaLens Historical ESG Scores

api_list.name: getHistoricalScoresByYear
api_list.description: This API returns historical Environmental, Social, Governance and Overall scores for companies on a scale of 0 to 100 based on the year provided in the request.  In addition to this, the API also provides other relevant metrics like Global Rank, Industry Rank and more.
